verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַדֶּשׁ־ <S%H6942><s%> Sanctify לִ֨י כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בְּכ֜וֹר <S%H1060><s%> unto me all the firstborn פֶּ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> whatsoever openeth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every רֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H7358><s%> the womb בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> [both] of man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and of beast לִ֖י הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people זָכ֞וֹר <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יְצָאתֶ֤ם <S%H3318><s%> in which ye came out מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> of bondage כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> by בְּחֹ֣זֶק <S%H2392><s%> for by strength יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> of hand הוֹצִ֧יא <S%H3318><s%> brought you out יְהֹוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and nothing יֵאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> be eaten חָמֵֽץ׃ <S%H2557><s%> from this [place] there shall no leavened bread
הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> This day אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you יֹצְאִ֑ים <S%H3318><s%> came ye out בְּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> in the month הָאָבִֽיב׃ <S%H24><s%> Abib

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> shall be when יְבִֽיאֲךָ֣ <S%H935><s%> shall bring יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> And it shall be when the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee into the land הַֽ֠כְּנַעֲנִי <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites וְהַחִתִּ֨י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites וְהַחִוִּ֣י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֗י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers לָ֣תֶת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָ֔ךְ אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey וְעָבַדְתָּ֛ <S%H5647><s%> that thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> this service הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> in this month הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days תֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> thou shalt eat מַצֹּ֑ת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> and in the seventh חַ֖ג <S%H2282><s%> [shall be] a feast לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD

מַצּוֹת֙ <S%H4682><s%> Unleavened bread יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> shall be eaten אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and nothing יֵרָאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> be seen לְךָ֜ חָמֵ֗ץ <S%H2557><s%> and there shall no leavened bread וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵרָאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> seen לְךָ֛ שְׂאֹ֖ר <S%H7603><s%> with thee neither shall there be leaven בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> with thee in all thy quarters

וְהִגַּדְתָּ֣ <S%H5046><s%> And thou shalt shew לְבִנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> thy son בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying בַּעֲב֣וּר <S%H5668><s%> [This is done] because of זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> that עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [which] the LORD לִ֔י בְּצֵאתִ֖י <S%H3318><s%> unto me when I came forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> shall serve לְךָ֨ לְא֜וֹת <S%H226><s%> And it shall be for a sign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָדְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> unto thee upon thine hand וּלְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <S%H2146><s%> and for a memorial בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among עֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> between thine eyes לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> and it תִּהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> shall serve תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD'S בְּפִ֑יךָ <S%H6310><s%> may be in thy mouth כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> for with a strong הוֹצִֽאֲךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> brought thee out יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> hath the LORD מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֛ <S%H8104><s%> Thou shalt therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֻקָּ֥ה <S%H2708><s%> this ordinance הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> its לְמוֹעֲדָ֑הּ <S%H4150><s%> in his season מִיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> from year יָמִֽימָה׃ <S%H3117><s%> to year ס

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now when יְבִֽאֲךָ֤ <S%H935><s%> shall bring יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And it shall be when the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee into the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> he נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> as he sware לְךָ֖ וְלַֽאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thee and to thy fathers וּנְתָנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> and shall give לָֽךְ׃

וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <S%H5674><s%> That thou shalt set apart כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every פֶּֽטֶר־ <S%H6363><s%> all that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <S%H7358><s%> the matrix לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every פֶּ֣טֶר ׀ <S%H6363><s%> and every firstling שֶׁ֣גֶר <S%H7698><s%> that cometh בְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> of a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> own לְךָ֛ הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <S%H2145><s%> which thou hast the males לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [shall be] the LORD'S

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every פֶּ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> And every firstling חֲמֹר֙ <S%H2543><s%> of an ass תִּפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> thou shalt redeem בְשֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> with a lamb וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִפְדֶּ֖ה <S%H6299><s%> and if thou wilt not redeem וַעֲרַפְתּ֑וֹ <S%H6202><s%> it then thou shalt break his neck וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> and every בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> and all the firstborn אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of man בְּבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> among thy children תִּפְדֶּֽה׃ <S%H6299><s%> shalt thou redeem

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> shall be when יִשְׁאָלְךָ֥ <S%H7592><s%> asketh בִנְךָ֛ <S%H1121><s%> And it shall be when thy son מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> thee in time to come לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> What [is] this? that thou shalt say אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him בְּחֹ֣זֶק <S%H2392><s%> unto him By strength יָ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> of hand הוֹצִיאָ֧נוּ <S%H3318><s%> brought us out יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when הִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> would hardly פַרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> And it came to pass when Pharaoh לְשַׁלְּחֵנוּ֒ <S%H7971><s%> let us go וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> slew יְהֹוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבְּכֹ֥ר <S%H1060><s%> both the firstborn אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> and the firstborn בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> of beast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> after that אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I זֹבֵ֜חַ <S%H2076><s%> therefore I sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every פֶּ֤טֶר <S%H6363><s%> all that openeth רֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H7358><s%> the matrix הַזְּכָרִ֔ים <S%H2145><s%> being males וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> but all the firstborn בָּנַ֖י <S%H1121><s%> of my children אֶפְדֶּֽה׃ <S%H6299><s%> I redeem

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> shall serve לְאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> And it shall be for a token עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָ֣דְכָ֔ה <S%H3027><s%> upon thine hand וּלְטוֹטָפֹ֖ת <S%H2903><s%> and for frontlets בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> between thine eyes כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> with בְּחֹ֣זֶק <S%H2392><s%> for by strength יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> of hand הוֹצִיאָ֥נוּ <S%H3318><s%> brought us forth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt ס

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become בְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> go פַּרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> And it came to pass when Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> had let the people וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נָחָ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> led אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> that God דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> them not [through] the way אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> although קָר֖וֹב <S%H7138><s%> that [was] near ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> though אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> for God פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> might יִנָּחֵ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> repent הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> Lest peradventure the people בִּרְאֹתָ֥ם <S%H7200><s%> when they see מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> war וְשָׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and they return מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt

וַיַּסֵּ֨ב <S%H5437><s%> about אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> But God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [through] the way הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֑וּף <S%H5488><s%> of the Red וַחֲמֻשִׁ֛ים <S%H2571><s%> harnessed עָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> the bones יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for הַשְׁבֵּ֨עַ <S%H7650><s%> with him for he had straitly הִשְׁבִּ֜יעַ <S%H7650><s%> sworn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying פָּקֹ֨ד <S%H6485><s%> will surely יִפְקֹ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> visit אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהַעֲלִיתֶ֧ם <S%H5927><s%> away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמֹתַ֛י <S%H6106><s%> my bones מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> here אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they took their journey מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <S%H5523><s%> from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped בְאֵתָ֔ם <S%H864><s%> in Etham בִּקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> in the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness

וַֽיהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD הֹלֵךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H6440><s%> before יוֹמָ֜ם <S%H3119><s%> them by day בְּעַמּ֤וּד <S%H5982><s%> in a pillar עָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> of a cloud לַנְחֹתָ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> to lead הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> them the way וְלַ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and by night בְּעַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> in a pillar אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire לְהָאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> to give them light לָהֶ֑ם לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> travel יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> by day וָלָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> and night

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָמִ֞ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> He took not away עַמּ֤וּד <S%H5982><s%> the pillar הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> by day וְעַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> nor the pillar הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> [from] before הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people פ
